about_the_game:
The Story of Pan Drivers Burger:

Once upon a time, Pan Drivers was the hottest spot in a small tropical town, known for serving the best burgers in the universe. The head chef was a legend, not only for his cooking skills but also for his obsession with fast cars. In fact, he loved racing so much that he once hosted an underground race right inside the restaurant itself.

Tragically, that race ended in disaster. The chef crashed his beloved car in a fiery accident, but something strange happened. Instead of simply perishing, he fused with his car in a surreal twist of fate. No one really understands how or why, but in this world, logic takes a back seat to the absurd.

Now, the restaurant is struggling, and it’s up to you to save it. The twist? You’re the car. Whether by possession or some bizarre reanimation, you’ve become the new “chef,” taking over the kitchen – but as a small, fast-moving vehicle. Your task is to drive around the restaurant, honking at customers to get their orders and then literally cooking by rolling over a giant frying pan in the middle of the restaurant.

But it doesn’t stop there. Rumors swirl that the chef’s death wasn’t an accident. Something – or someone – is watching, and as you scramble to flip burgers and toss out unwanted ingredients, you’ll need to uncover the mystery behind the crash. All while trying to keep the restaurant afloat and avoiding the same fate as your predecessor.

Drift around the restaurant to find hungry customers

be quick!

Listen to their complaints

and their stories

Flip burgers carefully

Remember to fry them both sides, but do not over do it

Deliver them their food

and grow your family's legacy!

short_description: In Pan Drivers Burger, you’re a car-turned-chef cooking for bizarre customers. Drive across a giant frying pan to flip burgers, honk for orders, and uncover the mystery of the previous chef’s tragic accident. Can you save the restaurant from going under?
